title: How India can be a fertile ground to be a technology led innovation garage and what are the factors that favour India? - Quora

response.answer_text: It can never become a fertile ground for technology led innovations because of the reasons noted bellow. 1.If you are working in govt sector,and tried to innovate something ,you are most like to be punished.Because in the their rule book ,innovation is not written.But there are some Enthusiasts & Nationalist type people,who do it at their own risk.But they are punished even if they succeeded ultimately.The reason given is why they didn't follow the rule book. 2.Even if you are in a private company and you tried and succeeded ,the credit will go to your boss. http://3.By nature we are dishonest people and never recognise merit & innovative people. 3.If you start your own & try to develop something new,banks will never fund you,and to give examples if such things are existing somewhere. OK ,if you develop something Indian market is not going to accept a new product so easily. So let's not waste our energies on impossibles. I don't say that there is a shortage of innovative people.
